title: Guardian of the Burning Dynasty
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, cinematic lighting, full body portrait of a heroic Xianxia warrior, intricately designed bronze dragon-scale armor with red cloth accents, wearing a fierce horned helmet with glowing blue eyes. He wields a fantastical, steampunk-like nozzle projecting a powerful, brilliant azure stream of spiritual water/qi energy, directly aimed at the threat. Dynamic walking pose, debris and embers flying around. The foreground shows cracked earth inscribed with arcane symbols. The background depicts a ruined ancient Chinese city with burning pagodas and thick smoky orange clouds. A massive, fiery dragon spirit manifests menacingly in the distant sky. Epic, dramatic atmosphere, high contrast. Aspect ratio 9:16.
